WRITING.TITLE: Let's Stop The "___ Added To Roster" Threads
WRITING.TEXT:
Guys, it's kind of clear now that Monstercat switched up what needs to happen for you to be added to the roster now. Now it's if you release a single, you'll get added. Therefore, just post in the megathread of that single if they've been added to the roster, don't make a thread about it.
Thanks.
On bustre though, i feel like he's still producing, because he released arcade after EHAE. If there's something I missed, please let me know.

WRITING.TITLE: [Request] Cymatics Outbreak (Only Bonuses)
WRITING.TEXT: I've already found a torrent link for the presets, but I wasn't able to get any of the bonuses. Thank you so much!

this is going to sound cliche, but do it like PBN. according to their ama, they get down an arrangement of the track, then spend time making each portion as good as it could be. it's the easiest way to ensure that each part of your track is good while still connecting the whole song,
fucking stop with the paid crap.
1. LUCA LUSH (that saxophone on the second drop though) 2. Diskord 3. MRVLZ 4. Slushii 5. Getter 6. Streex
you did, but now not so much: http://prntscr.com/caxl8r
